translations: n.蜡染色法；用蜡染色的布；[纺] 蜡防印花法
adj.蜡染的；似蜡防印花的；蜡染花布的

sentences.sentence: Letter holder adopts the traditional decoration pattern and it is the orthodox batiks.
sentences.translation: 信插采用传统装饰纹样，是正宗的蜡染。

sentences.sentence: Bronze handicrafts, batiks, pottery, marble and bamboo articles are special local products of Kunming.
sentences.translation: 斑铜、蜡染、陶器、大理石、竹器是昆明的特色工艺品。
